enhanced_by.reason: Setting inner HTML content before calling outerHtml ensures the content is correctly reflected in the outer HTML.
Wrapping elements with additional HTML before calling outerHtml can affect the resulting outer HTML structure.
Both outerHtml and html methods return HTML content, making assertions on the output of outerHtml easier by comparing it to the output of html.
The toString method also returns the outer HTML, making it a suitable candidate for asserting the correctness of the outerHtml method.
